name: Sinper Chicken Shoot 3D
description:
Sinper Chicken Shoot 3D is a sniper hunter shooting game. Chicken shoot has never been this much fun.
Gme is en-thrilling and fun as they run flapping their wings in a crazy way. Chicken shoot is a fun way to experience sniper shooting and shooter enjoys alot.
Features:

- Best chicken sounds
- 3D game with modern sniper gun
- A great chicken simulator
- A funny battleship with advanced weapons
